title: Client Scheduling for Multiserver Federated Learning in Industrial IoT With Unreliable Communications
summaries: in the decentralized FL framework, propose __a client-server association algorithm for the multi-server scenario__ to minimize the global training loss function
systemModel: schedule clients among multiple servers to minimize the global training loss function<ol>
clients perform $T_1$ rounds of local training<ol>
clients upload to the associated edge server
after $T_2$ rounds of intra-cluster aggregation, edge servers broadcast their models to the adjacent servers<ol>
each edge server performs inter-cluster model aggregation
